context_menu_for_media.description: Contextual menu item for audio, video and images

context_menu_for_selection.description: Contextual menu item for text selection

app_desc.message: Google Chrome2Glass Extension enables you to send text, images and other information from Chrome to your Glass device.

sending_message.description: Notice when link is being sent to glass.

sent_message.description: Notice when link has been successfully sent to Glass.

error_sending_message.description: Notice when link cannot be sent. $details$ is automatically replaced with the error text.

sign_in_required_message.description: Notice when sign in is required. $link$ is automatically replaced with 'sign in'.

sign_in_message.description: Sign in phrase used in the context of 'Please sign in to Chrome2Glass'.

invalid_scheme_message.message: Only http or https pages supported.
invalid_scheme_message.description: Notice when user attempt to send a file link.

connectivity_error_message.description: Error message when there is a connection error with the server.

device_not_registered_message.description: Error message when we can't match a user to a device.

about_message.message: Chrome2Glass, from LunnLimited, enables you to send text, images and other information from Chrome to your Glass device. Chrome2Glass is comprised of a Chrome browser extension and a GlassWare application.

signed_in_message.message: Signed in. You are now ready to send links to your Glass.

signed_out_message.message: You are now signed out of Chrome2Glass.
